metadata.creator: Kevin MacLeod
metadata.description: Song is titled Werq by Kevin MacLeod using a Creative Commons licence. He is the creator and I am just sharing his music for everyone to enjoy. It is classified as Disco, Electronica, Pop and he says he designed it to be used as a theme song for a podcast

Electronica
Pop
metadata.title: werq-by-kevin-macleod
